metadata.title: CVE-2025-1042 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An insecure direct object reference vulnerability in GitLab EE affectingall versions from 15.7 prior to 17.6.5, 17.7 prior to 17.7.4, and 17.8prior to 17.8.2 allows an attacker to view repositories in an unauthorizedway.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
